name: Escape The Lab (itch) (IndieAustin)
description:
STORY:

You are an abomination created by a lab. You get out of your room, so they flood the lab with acid so you cant escape.

GOAL:

Climb as high as you can in the endless lab.

CONTROLS:

A or 🡸 to move left, D or 🡺 to move right, Left mouse click to grapple
